title: Cannot find Intel MKL
body_html:
Attempting to compile pytorch from git, Intel MKL 2017 is not found unless I change in torch/lib/TH/cmake/FindMKL.cmake:

-  SET(mklvers "em64t")
+  SET(mklvers "intel64")

and define in the build_all.sh script in the cmake call INTEL_MKL_DIR=$MKLROOT and CMAKE_LIBRARY_PATH=/opt/intel/compilers_and_libraries_2017/linux/lib/intel64.

body:
Attempting to compile pytorch from git, Intel MKL 2017 is not found unless I change in `torch/lib/TH/cmake/FindMKL.cmake`:

```
-  SET(mklvers "em64t")
+  SET(mklvers "intel64")
```
and define in the `build_all.sh` script in the cmake call `INTEL_MKL_DIR=$MKLROOT` and `CMAKE_LIBRARY_PATH=/opt/intel/compilers_and_libraries_2017/linux/lib/intel64`.
